response.original_title: Howard Lederer: More Secrets of Texas Limit Hold 'Em
response.overview: Howard Lederer, arguably the world's best No-Limit Texas Hold 'Em player, shares his secrets about one of poker's most popular games. This is the second DVD in the series. Lederer teaches betting strategy, gives valuable hints about spotting tells, shares clues on bluffing, gives ideas about slow play, and tells fascinating stories about championship play. Players new to the game can learn the basics, while intermediate players can learn how to sharpen their skills.
response.title: Howard Lederer: More Secrets of Texas Limit Hold 'Em
